attributes.action: New bus route the number 10 bus on Markham Road, Edlington, Doncaster.
attributes.additional_details: I have many video evidence of the buses, I have a written petition already but would like an electronic on that I can share on social media to get more support as not only our street residents are against this many people in the village are too as they use this road and the buses obstruct cars all the time as there is only enough room for cars and vans.
attributes.background: It started 16th May 2016, street too small heavy on traffic no privacy it has increased noise & toxic pollutions they run 6.16am to 11.16pm every 10 mins everyday. Vehicles are parked on road there are already 2 major bus routes either side of this street. Residents on this street do not want it.

rejection.details:
Local bus routes are not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
